5 The company had no transactions with companies struck off under section 248 of the Companies Act, 2013 or section 560 of companies Act,1956
6 No Proceedings have been initiated or pending against the company for holding any benami property under the Benami Transactions (Prohibitions Act, 1988) and the rules made therunder.
7 The Company has not been declared willful defaulter by any bank or financial Institution or any other Lender.
8 The Company has not prepared any Scheme of Arrangements in terms of Section 230 to 237 of the Companies Act, 2013.
9 Company has complied with the number of layers prescribed under clause (87) of section 2 of the Act read with Companies (Restriction on number of Layers) Rules, 2017
